question: Which ministry Sets Up Task Force on Artificial Intelligence?
option1: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option4: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution.
explanation: Union Commerce and industry minister Nirmala Sitharaman constituted a task force on Artificial Intelligence for the country's Economic Transformation. The 18-member panel, headed by Dr. V. Kamakoti of IIT Madras, will comprise of experts, academics, researchers and industry leaders. It will explore the possibilities to leverage Artificial Intelligence for development across various fields. The task force will submit concrete and implementable recommendations for government, industry and research institutions.
